message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $22,000. I believe it holds significant value that you'll benefit from.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Can you meet me at that price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your price point, the value of this product is considerably higher. I could come down to $19,000. This is a significant reduction and reflects my willingness to make a deal happen.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $19,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $12,000. Can you consider that?
